config.section.general.tooltip: Configure how far crops can draw water from nearby natural water sources.
config.enabled.name: Enable Natural Irrigation
config.enabled.tooltip: If enabled, tilled soil near water is automatically watered at the start of each day.
config.radius.name: Water search radius
config.radius.tooltip: How many tiles around a tilled soil tile to search for nearby water. Set to 0 to disable the effect.
config.section.moisture.tooltip: Crops very close to water can benefit from richer soil moisture.
config.moisture.radius.name: High moisture radius
config.moisture.radius.tooltip: Tiles within this many tiles of water are considered in the "high moisture" zone and can receive bonus growth. 1 tile means only tiles directly next to water.
config.moisture.chance.name: Growth chance (%)
config.moisture.chance.tooltip: Percent chance per day that crops in the high moisture zone receive an extra day of growth progress.
config.section.overlay.tooltip: Debug overlay showing which tiles are being irrigated by Natural Irrigation.
config.overlay.show.name: Allow overlay
config.overlay.show.tooltip: If enabled, you can toggle a debug overlay to see irrigated tiles. The overlay starts hidden by default.
config.overlay.key.name: Overlay toggle key
config.overlay.key.tooltip: Press this key in-game to toggle the Natural Irrigation overlay on or off.
